page.title: 01AREA DESCRIPTION
page.content: THIS AREA IS MOSTLY{FARMLAND}WITH {THIRTEEN}FARMS, WHICH ARE MAINLY {MIXED-ARABLE. SITUATED ON THE MAIN ROAD{(A94)}IS A{FARM SHOP}WHICH SELLS MAINLY MEAT BUT ALSO PROVIDES HOME BAKING AND FRESH VEGETABLES. THERE IS A{LARGE ESTATE}IN THE AREA WHICH IS APPROXIMATELY{2500 ACRES IN SIZE AND HAS A WIDE RANGE OF {WILDLIFE.}THE WATER SUPPLY FOR MUCH OF THE ESTATE AND 90% OF FORFAR COMES FROM{BAGGERTON RESERVOIR,}WHICH TAKES ITS NAME FROM THE FARM IT STANDS ON. HISTORICAL INTEREST IN THE AREA INCLUDES THE SITE OF A {ROMAN CAMP, {THREE STANDING STONES}AND A{TUMULUS,} WHERE URNS HAVE BEEN FOUND. IN{JULY}OF{1985,}THERE WILL BE A {FORFAR BY PASS}BUILT WHICH WILL BE {DUAL CARRIAGEWAY.}THIS WORK IS DUE TO BE FINISHED BY{1987.
